about_the_game:
Cloudburst: Conquer Chaos, Choose Your Fate

Cloudburst invites you to a world where survival isn't just a goal; it's a testament to your adaptability and determination. On an island reshaped by chaos, you'll face relentless machine swarms, unforgiving environments, and survivors but also battle-royale players. Forge your path, shape your destiny, and do whatever it takes to outlast the day.

Key Features:

  • Unique Genre Fusion: Cloudburst revolutionizes gaming by seamlessly merging Battle Royale and Survival genres into a dynamic and thrilling experience that's entirely its own.
  • A Living World: The island of Cloudburst is ever-evolving, with regular content updates that keep the adventure fresh and unpredictable. From balance tweaks to new challenges and content additions, there's always something new to discover.
  • Infinite Possibilities: Explore procedurally generated worlds with map editor support, and customize your own servers with server-side modding options.
  • Diverse Transportation: Traverse the island using a variety of vehicles, including horses, modular cars, hot air balloons, helicopters, trains, and more.
  • Survival Mastery: Command complex electrical systems, engage in farming, and confront new threats, wildlife, and rival factions that call the island home.
  • Interactive Environment: Interact with hidden monuments, communicate through gestures, and create music with various instruments, all within the rich and immersive Cloudburst world.
  • Stunning Graphics: Immerse yourself in the island's beauty with recent graphics enhancements that bring every corner of Cloudburst to life.

SURVIVE


In Cloudburst, there are no set rules, only the ones you choose to follow. Craft tools, armor, and weapons to fend off threats. Forge alliances, build towns, and explore the island's enigmas alongside friends. Engage in trade with fellow survivors or embark on daring raids to seize their hard-earned rewards.

BATTLE ROYALE


Prepare for intense Battle Royale showdowns in Cloudburst, where up to 100 players are airdropped onto the island with a singular objective: recover the vital objective item and survive for extraction. But beware, the appearance of the objective triggers a challenging swarm attack. Only the fittest will emerge victorious, and the rewards are well worth the risk.

CONQUER


Choose your destiny as you navigate the tumultuous island of Cloudburst, armed with little more than a rock and a torch. From harsh weather conditions to hunger and thirst, the island's natural dangers test your mettle. Scavenge for resources, unveil the mysteries of forgotten settlements, and confront the enigmatic factions that call this place home. And always remember, other survivors lurk in the shadows.

ADAPT


Forge your path by constructing and fortifying bases to protect your territory and secure the island's precious resources. Ascend the tech tree, cultivate farms, harness electricity, and take command of various vehicles, from horses and cars to boats and helicopters. Adapt, strategize, and thrive as you utilize every means necessary to gain the upper hand.

The Future of Survival Awaits

Cloudburst is a living, breathing world where your choices shape your destiny. As the game continues to evolve, you'll find boundless opportunities for adventure, cooperation, and conflict. Join our Discord community to stay updated, share your thoughts, and embark on the ultimate survival journey.

Add Cloudburst to Your Wishlist

Prepare to conquer chaos by adding Cloudburst to your Steam wishlist. Be among the first to navigate this dynamic, ever-changing world and define your own path to survival.

Note: Cloudburst's release date will be announced as development progresses. Stay tuned for updates and announcements on our Discord and Steam pages.


Meet Elena: Explorer of the New World

In the desolate remnants of this world forever changed, a remarkable individual emerges as the heart and soul of the story. Born after the fall of civilization, she embodies the resilience and curiosity that define her generation.

Biologist's Dream

Her fascination with the natural world blossomed in the midst of chaos. Against all odds, she nurtured her passion for biology, seeking to understand and appreciate the intricate wonders of the post-apocalyptic ecosystem. In a world teetering on the brink of collapse, her drive to uncover the mysteries of life stands as a testament to the enduring spirit of humanity.

Kindness and Courage

In this small world and even smaller island, she's known for her kindness and unwavering bravery. In a harsh and unforgiving battle for survival, her compassion shines a warm glow, a rare beacon of empathy that has the power to unite the fractured.

Discoverer's Heart

She embodies the spirit of a true discoverer, dedicating her days to documenting the new, the wondrous, and the previously unseen in the world she calls home. Her unwavering quest for knowledge drives her to venture into the unknown, to unveil secrets long buried beneath layers of devastation.

Promise of Encounter

You are not our remarkable protagonist, but her presence looms large, you will have the opportunity to cross paths and even help her. In a world fraught with challenges, forging alliances is key to survival, and her presence offers a chance to uncover the untold stories of Cloudburst, together.
detailed_description:
Join our Discord community

Your ideas could shape the future of our game and make it even better, there you can share your thoughts, suggestions, and feedback directly with our game development team.

Our Discord community is also more than just a place to discuss the game – it's a hub of excitement and enthusiasm. Join us, make new friends, be a part of our Cloudburst family!

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Enter a world of chaos where survival is just a beginning. Take the role of a Scavenger or a Void-Walker to battle machine swarms, hostile players, and a dynamic environment. Build, scavenge, and fight for dominance in this fusion of Survival and Battle-royale. Choose your fate - survive or perish.
